message: Torej Zanima me če je kakšna omejitev pri dolžini IDE in napajalnih kablov? Sam bi rabil razdaljo kakih 4ih metrov. Hvala.

Dan's Data  The maximum cable length you're meant to use for any ATA interface - any kind of modern "IDE" drive - is 457mm, according to the official specification. That's 18 inches. This length limit applies to 40 and 80-wire cables alike. 80 wire cables also can't be any shorter than 254mm (ten inches), by the way.  In practice, 24 inch/600mm cables should be just fine for UDMA/33 mode with modern hardware. They may work OK for UDMA/66 as well, but I wouldn't count on it.
Humm, pol bo ocitno treba kar na USB dat. Hvala vseeno
JEst sm kupu lani IDE kable ki imajo 90cm, gor sta 2 diska in CD RW in DVD RW, tko da...
klik ^^mal preberi kolk dolge kable si je naredu
